text: Halliyavarinda allahanu tanna dutarige kodisida sampattu allahanige, dutarige, bandhugalige, anatharige, badavarige mattu prayanikarige seride. Sampattu kevala nim'ma srimantara naduve simitavagi uliyabaradendu (idannu vidhisalagide). Dutaru nimage nididdannu svikarisi kolliri mattu yavudarinda avaru nim'mannu tadeyuttaro adarinda duraviri mattu allahanige anjiri. Khanditavagiyu allahanu kathina sikse niduvavanagiddane
